protein.general_function: Involved in copper ion transmembrane transporter activity

go_class.description: di-, tri-valent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity

reference.reference_text: Zhou B, Gitschier J: hCTR1: a human gene for copper uptake identified by complementation in yeast. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1997 Jul 8;94(14):7481-6.
